item.description:
We are not Racing (nor Flying), but this fits right in with our spirit of Speed & Thrills.

The 20th Anniversary Rhode Island National Guard Open House & Airshow offers the finest aerial and static displays along with activities for people of all ages.

Admission to the show and parking is FREE!

There will be a $10 donation collected at the entrance gates to support Hasbro Children's Hospital but it is purely voluntary.

Please take a look at their FAQ page to know what to expect.

Schedule:
0900 - Gates Open
1000 - Opening Flag Jump - Black Daggers
1010 - Tucker Teaser - Sean D. Tucker
1020 - Kevin Coleman Air Shows
1030 - Kent Pietsch
1040 - Rhode Warriors - C-130J Demo
1055 - John Klatt - ANG
1110 - F-18 Hornet Demo
1125 - Mike Goulian
1140 - Kent Pietsch
1150 - Black Daggers
1200 - Vandy 1 - Hak Hickman
1215 - Red Bull Air Force Jump Team
1225 - Kent Pietsch
1235 - Chuck Aaron - Red Bull Helicopter
1250 - John Klatt - ANG
1305 - A-10 Demo
1320 - Mike Goulian
1335 - F-18 Hornet Demo
1350 - Sean D. Tucker
1405 - Combined Arms Demo
1430 - Thunderbirds

Directions From Points North:
(Providence, Boston) - Take I95 South to Exit 9 - RT 4 South, North Kingstown, East Greenwich (left exit). Off of RT 4, take Exit 7B (Quonset) Stay on RT 403. RT 403 will become Roger Williams Way. After the 3rd traffic light on Roger Williams Way take a left onto Conway Street. Follow signs to Air National Guard Base.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll send out my cell number to the members attending.
item.name: AIR SHOW
